Welcome to Blogofile

This is an example Blogofile site that is optimized for HTML5 browsers.

Please see the Documentation for getting started and for customizing your site.

Specific customization points for this example:

  • _templates/theme.mako imports the stylesheet and a few custom web fonts from Google's CDN.
  • To change the twitter search for the widget on the right, see js/site.js and _templates/sidebar.mako.
